Translations.Text: hananim-eun moseege seongseoleul jueossnani geuga seongseoleul bad-ass-eum-e uisimhaji malla hananim-eun geugeos-euloila-el jason-ui bog-eum-i doedolog ha yeossnola
hananim-eun geudeul gaunde jido jadeul-eul dueo geubun-ui myeonglyeong-eulo geu deul-eul indohadolog hayeoss-euni geudeul-iinnaehal ttaela geudeul-i ttohan geubun-ui malsseum-eul mid-eul ttaela
sillo geudaeui junim-eun simpan-ui nal geudeul-i seolo dalli\xC2gdeon geosdeul-eul simpanhasinila

hananim-i ijeon-e manh-eun sedae leul myeolmangsikin geos-i geudeul-ege gyohun i doeji ani haessneunyo geudeul-ui geojujieseo geudeul-eun jigeumdo banghwanghago issneunyo sillo geu an-eneun malsseum-i issgeonman geudeul-eun deudji ani ham-ila

memaleun hwangmujie mul-eul daeeo geugeos-eulo nongjagmul-eul jaebaekehayeo geudeul-ui gachugdeulgwa geudeul jasindeul-i geu lobuteo seobchwihadolog haess-eum-eul geudeul-eun-alji moshago bojido moshaneunyo
man-il geudaega jinsil-ilamyeon eon je simpan-i oneunyo lago geudeul-i mul-eumae
illeogalodoe simpan-ui nal bulsin han jadeul-ui mid-eum-eun yuyongham-i eobs-eu myeo geudeul-egeneun mid-eum-eul gajil gihoe do gidaliji ani ham-ila
geuleohamae geudeullobuteo meollihago gidalila geudeul-eun sillo geunal-eul gidaligo iss-eul ppun-ila
